did.unittitle: Draft of Poem, "To C. L. G." by George Cabot Lodge, to his sister, Constance Lodge Gardner July 1898
Transcription of Poem, "To C. L. G." by George Cabot Lodge, to his sister, Constance Lodge Gardner, written by Mrs. Gardner from the published poem July 1898
